description_movie: From visionary director Robert Eggers comes The Northman, an action-filled epic that follows a young Viking prince on his quest to avenge his father's murder.
Albus Dumbledore assigns Newt and his allies with a mission related to the rising power of Grindelwald.
An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, where she alone can save the world by exploring other universes connecting with the lives she could have led.
While on vacation on the Nile, Hercule Poirot must investigate the murder of a young heiress.
